headline: PepsiCo: Tariff Headwinds Aren't Going Away
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. is a Hold due to ongoing tariff headwinds, margin pressure and mixed North America & International performance. Read more on PEP stock here.

headline: Emerging Santa Cruz-Based RTD Brand, West Peak Sparkling Spirits, Announces Strategic Advisory Committee
summary: Today, West Peak Sparkling Spirits, a spirit-based RTD made with sparkling water and real juice, is pleased to announce the appointment of an exceptional group of industry titans to help propel the brand into its next phase of growth.

headline: Buy 5 Consumer Staples Stocks Despite the Sector's Weak Show in 2025
summary: Consumer staples lag in 2025, but PEP, MNST, LW, UNFI and OLLI are five stocks that show improving growth drivers for 2026.

headline: PepsiCo's Challenges And How To Unlock Opportunities
